create_client.description: Create a new client in a workspace.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the new client.

props.name: external_reference
props.description: External reference to link this client with external systems.

props.name: notes
props.description: Notes for the client.

create_project.description: Create a new project in a workspace.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the new project.

props.name: is_private
props.description: Whether the project is private or not.

props.name: billable
props.description: Whether the project is billable. (Premium feature)

props.name: template
props.description: Whether the project is a template. (Premium feature)

props.name: external_reference
props.description: External reference to link this project with external systems.

props.name: color
props.description: Project color in hex format (e.g. #ff0000).

props.name: active
props.description: Whether the project is active.

props.name: auto_estimates
props.description: Whether estimates are based on task hours. (Premium feature)

props.name: estimated_hours
props.description: Estimated hours for the project. (Premium feature)

props.name: rate
props.description: Hourly rate for the project. (Premium feature)

props.name: fixed_fee
props.description: Project fixed fee. (Premium feature)

props.name: start_date
props.description: Start date of project timeframe (YYYY-MM-DD).

props.name: end_date
props.description: End date of project timeframe (YYYY-MM-DD).

create_tag.description: Create a new tag in the workspace.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the new tag.

create_task.description: Create a new task under a project.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the new task.

props.name: estimated_seconds
props.description: The estimated time for the task in seconds.

props.name: external_reference
props.description: External reference to link this task with external systems.

props.name: active
props.description: Whether the task is active. Use false to mark as done.

props.name: user_id
props.description: Creator ID, if omitted, will use requester user ID.

create_time_entry.description: Create a new time entry in a workspace.

props.name: start
props.description: The start time of the entry in UTC.

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration of the time entry. Use a negative number (e.g., -1) to start a running timer.

props.name: stop
props.description: The stop time of the entry in UTC. Can be omitted if still running.

props.name: billable
props.description: Whether the time entry is marked as billable.

props.name: user_id
props.description: Time entry creator ID. If omitted, will use requester user ID.

find_client.description: Find a client by name or status in a workspace.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the client to find (case-insensitive).

props.name: status
props.description: Filter clients by their status.

find_project.description: Find a project in a workspace by its name.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the project to find.

props.name: active
props.description: Return active, inactive, or both types of projects.

props.name: billable
props.description: Return only billable projects.

props.name: only_me
props.description: Get only projects assigned to the current user.

props.name: only_templates
props.description: Return only template projects.

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for pagination.

props.name: per_page
props.description: Number of items per page (max 200).

find_tag.description: Find a tag by name in a workspace.

props.name: search
props.description: Search by tag name.

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for pagination.

props.name: per_page
props.description: Number of items per page.

find_task.description: Find a task by name and status.

props.name: search
props.description: Search by task name.

props.name: project_id
props.description: Filter by project ID.

props.name: active
props.description: Filter by active state.

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for pagination.

props.name: per_page
props.description: Number of items per page (default 50).

props.name: sort_field
props.description: Field used for sorting.

props.name: sort_order
props.description: Sort order.

props.name: start_date
props.description: Smallest boundary date (YYYY-MM-DD).

props.name: end_date
props.description: Biggest boundary date (YYYY-MM-DD).

props.name: description
props.description: Search for time entries containing this text in description.

props.name: start_date
props.description: Get entries from start_date (YYYY-MM-DD or RFC3339 format).

props.name: end_date
props.description: Get entries until end_date (YYYY-MM-DD or RFC3339 format).

props.name: before
props.description: Get entries before given date (YYYY-MM-DD or RFC3339 format).

props.name: since
props.description: Get entries modified since this UNIX timestamp.

props.name: meta
props.description: Should the response contain data for meta entities.

props.name: include_sharing
props.description: Include sharing details in the response.

find_user.description: Find a user in a workspace by their name or email.

props.name: search_term
props.description: The name or email of the user to find.

props.name: active
props.description: Return only active users.

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for pagination.

props.name: per_page
props.description: Number of items per page.

start_time_entry.description: Start a new time entry (live timer).

props.name: billable
props.description: Whether the time entry is marked as billable.

stop_time_entry.description: Stops the currently running time entry.

new_client.description: Fires when a new client is created in a workspace.

new_project.description: Fires when a new project is added.

new_tag.description: Triggers when a new tag is created

new_task.description: Fires when a new task is created.

new_time_entry_started.description: Fires when a new time entry is started and is currently running.

new_time_entry.description: Fires when a new time entry is added (with optional project/task filter).

new_workspace.description: Fires when a workspace is created or updated (Toggl only supports workspace updated events).
